title: ICE in finish_resolving_def_to_ty on clippy

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Whilst rustupping Clippy, I got this ICE (on [this branch](https://github.com/Manishearth/rust-clippy/compare/rustup), https://github.com/Manishearth/rust-clippy/commit/d7ec9086ecbd6930695d932b7bf3bb150136a572):

```
$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo build
   Compiling clippy v0.0.36 (file:///home/manishearth/Mozilla/Wall/clippy2)
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', ../src/libcore/option.rs:330
stack backtrace:
   1:     0x7f82ed19bf40 - sys::backtrace::tracing::imp::write::hefc5f03291a5fdcdSmu
```
